Name: CANNON
About the game: CANNON is a minimalist puzzle game made with cannons that shoot balls to destroy cubes. Tunnels will challenge you to find the right order to destroy all the cubes in the scene The difficulty increases with several other mechanics. 50 progressive levels Original music and effects Minimalist and intuitive mechanics, use only the mouse button No time, no timer and no pressure, solve the puzzles in your time 50 Steam Achievements
